name: Crumble Corp. (Tech Demo)
description:
Crumble Corp. is a retro-style run 'n gun with an added dash mechanic, heavily inspired by games such as Shatterhand, Contra, and Journey to Silius. 

This demo was crafted almost entirely during the Summer of 2022.

[PROLOGUE]

M.M. Corporation, a tech cartel located underground, partook in the kidnapping of countless citizens for use as test subjects to undergo horrible experimentation; Yugo, one of the victims of such experiments, escaped the cartel. After two years of hefty preparation, Yugo embarks on a mission to destroy the cartel from within.

[DEFAULT CONTROLS]

(*using a controller with two analog sticks is recommended*)

Move: W,A,S,D, Left Stick

Jump: Space, Button South

Shoot: Enter, Button West, Right Trigger

Dash: Backslash, Button East

Punch/Kick: Right Shift, Button North

Aiming: Right Stick
